package.name: SpotifyAutoPlay
package.shortDescription: Autoplay Spotify when you opened from external URL!

descriptionlist.description: By default, when you open Spotify URL externally, only track URL will be auto played. This tweak allows you to achieve similar behaviour for playlist/album/radio/artist/chart URL. This tweak is tested fully working on Spotify v8.4.96 and v8.5.31. Untested version might or might not work.
